title: Adi Maane Song Lyrics Athangudi Ilayaraja
stanzas:
Adi Maane Song Lyrics Athangudi Ilayaraja Album
#AthangudiIlayaraja

Adi maane maragathame
yen manasu kaetha
poonjaaramae

maaman enna
yaen verutha.
en manasa sundi
yaen ilutha.

maane maragathame
yen manasu kaetha
poonjaaramae

Adi maane maragathame
yen manasu kaetha
poonjaaramae

maaman enna
yaen verutha.
en manasa sundi
yaen ilutha.

Adi maane maragathame
yen manasu kaetha
poonjaaramae

vetti poatta nagathunduthaan
vennilavaa theriyudhadi
(mudikku)
sikku edukkum seeppulathaan
manasu sikki thavikkudhadi (2)

aarum oadum kadala sera
en aasa oadum unna sera
en aasa oadum unna sera

azhage alli kodiye
aymponnaana porsilaye (2)

anbae enna yaen verutha
aadharava thara marutha
un aadharava thara marutha

kattik karumbu gaana kuyile
kalla sirippumkolludhadi..
kaathukedakku kayiru kattil
kattikka nee illaiyadi.(2)

kaalam kai koodumadi
naan kanda kanavum
palikkumadi
naan kanda kanavum
palikkumadi

kannae karunguyile
en kadhal kani amudhe
adi kannae karunguyile
en kadhal kani amudhe

pettiyadi emmanasu
pokkishamaa unna vachchen
pottu vacha poonguiyile
unnathaane naan nenachen.(2)

piththaana emmanasil
muththaaga unmugamthaan

maane maragathame
yen manasu kaetha
poonjaaramae

azhage alli kodiye
aymponnaana porsilaye

kannae karunguyile
en kadhal kani amudhe

maaman enna
yaen verutha.
en manasa sundi
yaen ilutha.
maane......
